recentChanges:
The 112 Operator Demo allows you to try out the game for free.

The demo version allow you to play up to 3 duty of the game's campaign on one of three cities: Paris, Berlin, and London.
comments: Im a big fan of 911 game and was expecting interesting stuff from 112. I have few feedback after playing initial 1 hr. The Operator sounds so tired and put off ! As if he is compelled to do the job or half sleeping, it instantly puts off the excitement of taking a call. There is a bar which shows how much time is being taken to solve a case but I would have preferred a countdown timer as in 911. Along with few more things but I don't have letters to type. All in all, The game looks unfinished.

Unnecessary Permissions! I wanted to test the demo before buying the game but now I won't get anything from this developer. Sophos Intercept X warned me because it tracks your location and movements, it has FULL read & write access to ALL storage on your device, and it is allowed to run on a locked device. No game needs that. Uninstalled.

It's no doubt is a great game, but few changes can definitely make it more joyful. - Sandbox mode is almost standard for most management games. Ppl can use the advantage to play with their imagination or test out game functions. - mobile screen is so small that it is so easy to accidentally tap on the wrong vehicle even with screen zoomed in. - I was using default mode to play and is rly hoping there's a way to cancel the selected vehicle. Or I'll end up sending units all around the map.

Nice time killer. The design is good and there's plenty to do. I'm not sure if the full game is worth 7 bucks, as something like this can become repetitive, in which I would lose interest. However, for people that enjoy things like this, 7 bucks isn't much.
Definitely better than 911 operator. It controls a heck of a lot better. The only improvement I would add is that controlling the fast forward and slow down menu is a little clunky and confusing.

title: Rescue Action - Doctor Hospital
description:
Girls, the rescue team received an emergency rescue mission. There are many people were trapped and injured by a hurricane. Let us join the rescue team and help those waiting to be rescued. Everyone is in a panic at the moment. So make sure to comfort them first and then do everything you can to treat them. Come on,be brave!
Feature：
1.Timely help the drowning boy to drain water from the respiratory tract.Help him with heart resuscitation surgery and help him change clean his clothes.
2.Help the tall man with leg surgery whose leg has broken by the boulder. He can't stand the pain any more. 
3.The girl's arm was burned by the fire, so help her quickly cleaned the wound and cool it down. Girls love beauty,so wrap them in pretty gauze.
4.The hurricane knocked down the trees in the woods and hurt the girl who was playing. Wipe the dirt off her body first and then help her heal.
5.The old woman walking in the park was so frightened that she heart was wounded and needed a heart stent. This is a big operation and it has to be more serious.
6.Take a look at these trophy. Thank you for being brave.

title: Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath - Hospital Drama
description:
Become a doctor in a romantic medical drama with aspiring intern Allison Heart!

GameHouse and Blue Giraffe proudly present the latest GameHouse Original Story, starring your favorite doctor, Allison Heart! 
Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath is an intense medical drama tied to a casual game that’ll move you to tears. The game has a gripping and unique storyline, original singer/songwriter music, highly detailed artwork and animation, cool addictive gameplay and an insane amount of heart. If you enjoy games that focus on great storytelling, this game is for you!

❤️ Experience the life of a doctor as you rush to find a cure for an unknown disease!
❤️ Your search for a cure will take you through six exciting new hospital wards, from the Clinic to the Morgue.
❤️ Play the full game with no extra charges, thanks to our free-to-play model. 
❤️  More levels to play than ever before! Enjoy 240 levels at launch, with more to come!
❤️ So many extras! Unlock new story scenes, level up your character to earn helpful bonuses, and purchase the upgrades YOU want to buy
❤️  Party with Oliver and his guinea pig friends, Punky and Olive.
❤️ Master new mini-games like a true doctor, all in medical style.
❤️ Additional levels will be added in the future, giving you even MORE of the game you love!


Follow Allison as she begins her last rotations as an intern at Queensburrow Bridge Hospital, on her path to graduating as a fully-fledged doctor! Unfortunately, things never go smoothly for Allison, and this is no exception. Dr. Ermey, the lead physician during her clinic rotation, seems to have it in for her, and threatens to fail her. Allison ends up watching her chances of becoming a doctor shrink by the minute, desperately searching for a solution, but unable to find one.
However, everything gets put on hold when a patient with a mysterious disease is admitted to the hospital. Several doctors end up becoming infected themselves, including Connor, Sophia… and Dr. Ermey. When the CDC quarantines Queensburrow, it’s a race against time for Allison and the other doctors to find a cure before more deaths occur. 
Your assistance will be invaluable to Allison as she tries to beat the clock and find a cure in time! Experience love, intense action, realistic drama, crazy funny moments and the beauty of celebrating life in Heart’s Medicine – Doctor’s Oath.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Follow GameHouse on Facebook:: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

*Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Dr. Cares and Fabulous:* https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

recentChanges:
Get ready to be scared in our upcoming Halloween event!
Gather Skulls to unlock a brand new seasonal story.
Open haunted chests to unlock new scary characters for daily play!
Play 100 new frightening levels and 30 daily challenges for extra spooky rewards.
Update now to join Allison on her bewitching adventure, starting October 23!
comments: I absolutely love this game it gives you back story, intrigue, and a real interest in the characters. I absolutely love it!!! I love story line it makes things that much more interesting and this game has everything to keep you hooked, it definitely has me. I just wish there was a way to get energy either from friends or from watching ads more because I hate waiting until my energy fills up again maybe they can work that in some how but honestly I have no issues with the game it's GREAT 👍👍👍👍

Love this game series I am subscriber. I don't mind the in app purchases I've made a few. My problem is the special events, I have the same problem with them all. Currently with the Halloween I have gotten to chest number 8 and am no longer getting credit for the skulls I've earned. So I can never finish an event. I stopped playing for awhile because of this issue and the fact that I can't get support in the game to work either. I haven't gotten credit for the skulls in the last 3 levels

I have been playing this game for a long time now and it's wonderful with the storyline and the game play it's been improved drastically. The only thing I'm complaining about is that it has a few bugs. When I just played I had a level with Ryan and a mobile clinic with tray decay and limited tray space. As soon as I pressed play, it cleared the entire level for me without me even playing with a score of zero and then I was stuck on the menu. It also crashes and I lost energy.

I have played all the Heart's Medicine games, and even purchased the monthly subscription to play them. This game however is completely different.. I hate the fact that there are now in app purchases and an energy system. I loved this game franchise BECAUSE it wasn't pay to play. Why are you shoving countless "special offers" in my face? I want to actually play and experience the story.. but now I see that money has become more of a priority. I cannot describe how disappointed I am.

Such a great game but the thing that I don't like about it, is how the couples kiss in the game. But its still a great game and I love how there is different items that you can purchase from the shop to make your docters office more better with the items! And I also love how there is speed so if you need help because your slow you can purchase speed with only 10 💎 and I use the speed alot for help when I start playing the game. ♡

comments: Awesome game but a big problem needs to get fixed though. Nothing but a really AWESOME game!! Been trying to beat it ever since I downloaded it. But the one thing that has been a pain & a prevention for me to achieve that, is this freaking bug that's causing the game to crash & making me loose the progress I had on a level. The good news is it's not "THE ENTIRE PROGRESS OF THE GAME". Lol 5 stars says you will get this game bug taken care of real quickly.

The campaign story is incredible, and there are many interesting scenarios that make the game both decently replayable and constantly entertaining. The only possible complaint I could think of is that the campaign could use more stories, as I could play this game for hours, and being interrupted but something like a story over screen is kind of underwhelming, considering the final part of the story doesn't really feel like an ending. Overall, 5/5 and I would rate higher if I could, great game

Knew I'd love this game! Been a fan of 911 Operator for ages now, so was excited to try this one! Put a few hours into it since I downloaded it earlier and I think that it will keep me busy for ages! Few niggles encountered, but it's so young that I'm sure they won't be there for long!

I am so glad 112 Operartor was created for Andriod. I have the original as well as both versions on PC. I love how the calls are new and the extra add on features like emails and missions. It is like I am on the job itself. It is definitely worth the money.

Love the game. Only problem i have is that its constantly crashing and freezing up. Have had to replay 2nd stage 5 times and cant progress as it keeps crashing. Its understandable as the game was just released, however this needs to be patched.

title: Doctor Hero
description:
Finally, a doctor game that lets you practice your surgeon skills. Start as an intern and do what it takes to become a hero surgeon. Don’t forget your Hippocratic oath, the patients need you. Save them and become their doctor hero. Are you ready to make them healthy and smile again?

- Diagnose the treatments.
- Examine the patients in your clinic.
- Operate on various surgery scenarios.
- Prevent spreading the virus
- Cure the world.

Game Features:
- Easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects
- Get more experience as you progress and unlock new tools
- Enjoy the best surgery & doctor simulation game

comments: I like the game but I had only played it for like an hour or less and I got bored since you did the same operation over and over again after a while.But it is still a good game .

title: Zapya Go - Share File with Those Nearby and Remote
description:
Stay connected and share with your close friends using Zapya Go. On top of being a convenient file sharing application, Zapya Go allows you to keep a low profile on its new completely private social platform. Zapya Go restricts strangers to send you messages or friend requests and does not generate friend recommendations to you. Only those who you have shared files with before can add you as a friend on this new social platform. 

Whether it is posting funny photos or a status update, you can safely share with your private circle of friends on the Moments section on Zapya Go without strangers seeing your precious moments. You can also chat with them without worrying about a third party viewing your conversation history when using the encrypted chat feature on Zapya Go Now you can be social on the same app that you use to share files, manage phone contents, and play games!

Spotlight Features

⚡Encrypted Chat
Stay in touch with your close friends without compromising your privacy by using the encrypted chat feature. The chat history is cleared as soon as the receiver has finished reading the message to ensure that there are no screenshots of the conversation.  

⚡No Login Required
No personal information or other social media account is required to login and interact with your close friends on Zapya Go. You can stay anonymous and be in control of your data!

⚡Offline Sharing
You do not need to have an Internet connection in order to share files using Zapya Go. 

⚡QR Code Sharing
Share and receive files easily with QR codes.

⚡Group Sharing
Want to share files with more than one person? Zapya Go’s Create Group and Join Group features allow you to easily share with multiple people.

⚡Remote Send
Now you can send files to a remote friend.  Just ask your friend to enter a 6-digit password and then you can send files via point-to-point direct connection.  If connection gets interrupted, you can resume transfer easily.

✔ Certified by Android Go

✔ For the application’s complete policy and conditions, please visit: https://www.izapya.com/zapya_go_policy_en.html

✔ For the application’s complete terms of service, please visit: 
https://www.izapya.com/Zapya_Go_Terms_of_Service.html

✔ For the latest news and updates, please visit:
http://blog.izapya.com/

title: ReLIVe Responder
description:
Over 350,000 incidents of Out-of- Hospital Cardiac Arrest occur every year. Are you prepared? Practice responding to cardiac arrest so you aren’t caught off guard. Play ReLIVe Responder!

Emergency situations are hectic and scary if you are unsure of what to do, and sometimes CPR means the difference between life and death. Any help that a cardiac arrest victim can get before EMS arrives can increase the chances of survival. 

-ReLIVe Responder: Cardiac Arrest will help prepare players to:
-Recognize cardiac arrest
-Know to call 911
-Communicate concise, condition-specific info to 911 dispatch
-Understand the basics of hands-only CPR
-Know how to transfer care to EMS and disengage 911 dispatch

This app was developed by ReLIVe, the University of Pittsburgh Resuscitation Logistics and Informatics Venture, a project funded with generous support from the Henry L. Hillman Foundation, and based in the University of Pittsburgh Department of Emergency Medicine. For more information about all of ReLIVe’s projects, visit www.pittrelive.org.

Disclaimer: ReLIVe Responder: Cardiac Arrest is designed to inform the player of the importance of responding to cardiac arrest and communicating concise, condition-specific information to 911 dispatch. This app does not replace formal CPR training. The game recognizes the player’s in game performance and has no merit upon real life aptitude. For more information about responding to cardiac arrest, visit: www.pittrelive.org

title: First Aid Help & Tutorial
description:
Download First Aid Help & Tutorial one of the best First Aid with nearby hospitals on Map using GPS Online and Works offline. 

★ What is First Aid?
First aid is the provision of immediate care to a victim with an injury or illness, usually affected by a lay person, and performed within a limited skill range. First aid is normally performed until the injury or illness is satisfactorily dealt with (treatment of major conditions such as performing CPR , stroke, heart attack or chocking, in the case of small cuts, minor bruises, and blisters) or until the next level of care, such as a paramedic or doctor or ambulance, arrives to reach nearby medical center. 

★ What is First Aid Help & Tutorial?
First Aid Help & Tutorial - Nearby Hospital is a handy app at the time of emergency. Learn all health steps before you need it. First Aid - Nearby Hospital app provides Map direction of nearest hospital at your current location. Get Map directions of nearby hospitals and make your device as Hospital tracking device on GPS Map.

 

Key guiding principles of first aid in First Aid Help & Tutorial - Nearby Hospital are-
➤ Prevent further injury
➤ Preserve life
➤ Promote recovery

Conditions that often require and included in First Aid - Nearby Hospital app:- 

★ Major
‣ Bleeding(Hand, Foot, Head Injuries)
‣ Stroke
‣ Heart Attack
‣ Chocking
‣ Seizure

★ Minor
‣ Snake Bite
‣ Bones(Fractures, Broken)
‣ Asthma
‣ Burns

★ Tips
‣ Provide Safety
Ensure safety for yourself, the casualty and bystanders.

‣ Look for Response
Look for a response, assess their signs and symptoms.

‣ Send for Help
Arrange for the ambulance to be called and send someone to obtain health related resources.

‣ First Aid
Provide first aid according to the injury or illness and within your own skills and limitations. 

★ Nearby Hospital 
Provide nearby hospitals at your current location on Map for emergency help.
Use this helpful health app as a first aid course such as CPR Training, plastering etc…

★ Features of App Of First Aid Help & Tutorial:
‣ Easy UI with Material Design
‣ Useful first aid treatment methods covered
‣ Graphics are used with every step for help

★ Coming up with more first aid activities
‣ Rate and review this app on Playstore

title: Canadian ACLS Mastery
description:
Ace your ACLS with Canadian ACLS Mastery! Featuring over 250+ practice questions covering ECG rhythm identification, pharmacology, and practical application, Canadian ACLS Mastery gets you score you need to get your ACLS and care for critical patients. 

**Content is based on the latest 2015 ACLS and CPR Provider Guidelines from the AHA. We continuously update our app to meet most recent standards.** 

Whether you are a paramedic, a nurse, or a med student, you can study on-the-go with tutorials, quick reference charts, core knowledge rationales, and Megacode practice questions and quizzes.  

No network connection required!

Created by experienced ACLS-certified professionals, Canadian ACLS Mastery allows you to study efficiently- anytime- anywhere. Now you can make better use of your downtime and have fun while doing it!

Features: 
• 200+ practice questions with images and detailed explanations 
• Content based on 2015 Canadian ACLS Provider Manual and AHA Guidelines Updates for CPR and ECC 
• Access in-depth information on assessment tools and common laboratory tests and learn how to interpret the significance of your findings.
• Review step by step instructions for IO insertion, pacing, and cardioversion so you can enhance your ACLS learning stations
• Includes our how-to guide to obtaining your ACLS Certification, along with test-taking strategies for the test
• In depth statistics display your strengths and weaknesses 

Categories Include: 
• ECG rhythms
• Pharmacology
• The BLS
• Primary and Secondary Surveys
• Special Circumstances
• Post-Arrest Care
• Core Algorithms
• Dosing algorithm for naloxone

Whether you are facing the Megacode testing station for first time or tackling ACLS renewal, ACLS Mastery will prepare you for success. Content is based on current AHA guidelines, best practice standards, and tips from the experts. Let the ACLS Mastery App help you achieve the results you work hard for everyday.

title: Lifesaver for Tablet
description:
Learn how to perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) anywhere, anytime, for free. 

Lifesaver is a cutting-edge way to learn life-saving skills through four action-packed scenarios. It throws you into the heart of the action as you make the crucial decisions and learn the essential skills needed to save a life.

Features:
- Easy user interface
- 4 films with clear visual and audio interactions
- Real-life stories shared by rescuers and survivors
- 6 real stories shared by witnesses
- Common questions answered by first aid experts
- Real-time feedback for your accuracy, speed and answers
- Built-in technology to detect speed and depth of CPR
- Emergency information and medical FAQs

Lifesaver is developed by UNIT9, with funding from the Resuscitation Council (UK).

NOTE: the Lifesaver Mobile app abides exclusively by the UK resuscitation guidelines.
NOTE: Lifesaver is a web and mobile-based interactive application for training purposes only and completion of the modules does not constitute a certificate of competence as further training is recommended.

Lifesaver website > https://life-saver.org.uk 
Resuscitation Council (UK) website > http://www.resus.org.uk 
UNIT9 website > http://www.unit9.com 


To ensure we deliver the highest quality experience, Lifesaver for Tablet requires Android 5.0 and above, and currently supports the following devices:
•	Nexus 7 (2013)
•	Galaxy Tab 4

title: SAM Trainer
description:
The SAM Trainer is designed to educate potential rescuers on the basics of the HeartSine Automatic External Defibrillator (AED) use. It is designed to work in conjunction with the HeartSine vTrainer to generate a user experience similar to that of the HeartSine SAM 350P, SAM 360P and SAM 500P with CPR Advisor (the SAM 500P is not available in the US).

For more information visit www.heartsine.com/heartsine_vtrainer/ 

Simply download the SAM Trainer app and:

1. Select your language.

2. Choose from a semi-automatic SAM 350P or SAM 500P, or fully automatic SAM 360P.

3. Push the green ON button to begin.

The app will guide you through the use of a HeartSine AED!

Features:

• 10 languages available

• User adjustable CPR duration (Under the “i” tab on the Device selection screen)

• Quick access to “How to Use” videos for the SAM 350P, SAM 360P and SAM 500P.

• Easy restart of app at any stage by pressing the back button

title: Learn first aid
description:
First aid is essential for any situation.
Then download this application to learn situations and emergency actions. Totally free, with a comprehensive manual to save a life with the basic knowledge for a resuscitation or for the most injured injuries.

The first actions in the injured are important. A necessary training for the life of the neighbor, or that child. There are many situations that we encounter in life, and with some basic knowledge we can act.

With this first aid application you can learn to heal those wounds in an accident, practice cardiopulmonary resuscitation, an entire emergency manual to save a life.
Acts quickly in a choking, injury to children in an accident.
Every minute counts until the ambulance arrives.

With the videos of this application, it acts as a toilet while the doctor arrives. We all must have knowledge of first aid and learn to save or act in situations.

Here you have a manual of resuscitation or injury, emergency cures. The first actions count.

Have necessary and sanitary training because we can find ourselves in difficult situations like a traffic accident, or choking of a child or worse, of infants.

Download this application totally free on your device, an essential manual for adults, completely updated, now you will have the knowledge for injuries, blows or accidents.
Always remember it.

title: EMS NOTES: EMT & PARAMEDIC ESSENTIAL FIELD FACTS
description:
EMS Notes: EMT & Paramedic Field Guide delivers all of the essential facts and clinical information EMTs and paramedics need in the field and in the ED. Download the FREE app and view selected topics (Approximately 10% of the content is viewable in the free app and tapping on the locked topic will launch the in-app purchase screen).

ABOUT EMS NOTES: EMT & PARAMEDIC FIELD GUIDE
EMS Notes: EMT & Paramedic Field Guide provides mobile healthcare practitioners with the latest in trusted clinical information for more accurate, confident and informed decision-making at point-of-care.

DESCRIPTION:
EMS Notes: EMT & Paramedic Field Guide delivers all of the essential facts and clinical information EMTs and paramedics need in the field and in the ED. This latest update, created in partnership with F. A. Davis Company, comes with additional features, enhanced functionality and ongoing updates. 

From common medications and the interpretation of 12-lead ECGs to current algorithms and procedures, you'll find the answers to the questions that arise everyday, organized in 8 convenient sections. 

KEY FEATURES;
- Contains all the facts and field information needed by EMTs and Paramedics
- Differentiates the skills and tasks performed at the basic and intermediate levels, as well as those performed by paramedics, identifying the primary responsibility of each
- Covers over 100 emergency and nearly 2,000 common prescription drugs
- Covers primary and secondary trauma, and offers a simple approach to the rapid triage of multiple patients
- Includes the most current CPR, ACLS, PALS, and NRP algorithms from the American Heart Association and the American Academy of Pediatrics
- Features Spanish translations of common medical terms, history, assessment and pain-related questions, the phonetic pronunciations, and includes questions which require ‘yes’ or ‘no’ responses

BUILT-In MEDICAL CALCULATORS:
Provide instant access from within clinical topics to the
- APGAR Score
- Glasgow Coma Score (GCS)
- Pediatric Trauma Score
- Revised Trauma Score (RTS)

SPECIAL FEATURES:
Locate a disease, symptom or medication  in the fastest possible manner:
- Tap and Hold launch icon to open Last Topic, History, Favorites ..
- Navigate using multiple indices
- History to open frequently visited pages
- Bookmarks 

NEVER FORGET ANYTHING:
Mark topics with relevant information:
- Voice Notes
- Annotations with scribble, doodle or text

You choose the method to note this regardless of the context you are in to ensure that the important facts are available whenever you access the topic, whether it is tomorrow or six months from now.

title: ACLS Pretest
description:
Become a first rate ACLS provider with ACLS Pretest! ACLS Pretest is an innovative tool in mobile learning and exam preparation that allows you to study anywhere, anytime, right from your mobile device. We strive to make studying more efficient by redefining how you prepare for the ACLS exam. ACLS Pretest has over 500 learning experiences including practice questions with rationale, life-saving algorithms, megacode simulations, and more.

*The content in this app is based on the latest emergency cardiovascular care (ECC) guidelines as published by the American Heart Association (AHA) and determined in conjunction with the International Liaison Committee on Resuscitation (ILCOR).*

No network connection required! 

ACLS Pretest was developed by physicians, nurses, and paramedics. These medical professionals have actually performed codes; they know what it feels like to perform chest compressions, push epinephrine, and use shock paddles.

ACLS Pretest has the content you need to be confident during a code.

Content and Features:
• 350+ practice questions with rationale; immediate feedback to help you learn
• 20+ algorithms tell you the best course of action so you always know what to do next
• Megacode simulators test your knowledge of the material in real-world scenarios
• Accurate definitions for the 100 key terms most often used in advanced critical care and resuscitation
• Full length ACLS, BLS, and PALS provider manuals based on AHA guidelines
• Progress tracking dashboard tells you what you’ve mastered and where to improve

Don’t simply pass the ACLS exam. Let the ACLS Pretest app help you become more confident during a code and learn how to provide lifesaving care when it matters. 

Need help? Our Customer Success team is available from 8am to 6pm CST, Monday-Friday. Contact us through the app’s support section for a response within 24 hours.

title: ACLS MegaCodes Review 2015
description:
ACLS MegaCodes Review reflects the updated 2015 American Heart Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support Guidelines and provides a complete review of advanced cardiovascular life support, including the new 2015 ICOR update.

ACLS MegaCodes Review simulator let you test your skills in real-life situations. You can practice making life-or-death decisions and learn acute ACLS interventions. Choose defibrillation levels and pharmacologic treatments for every possible resuscitation situation. Take actual practice tests used for ACLS certification.

ACLS MegaCodes Review covers everything from airway management and rhythms to electrical therapy, acute coronary syndromes, and acute stroke.

ACLS MegaCodes Review helps EMTs, nurses, students, and physicians successfully complete the American Heart Association Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) course and certification exam. Experienced providers can choose more challenging Place in Correct Order questions.
descriptionHTML:
ACLS MegaCodes Review reflects the updated 2015 American Heart Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support Guidelines and provides a complete review of advanced cardiovascular life support, including the new 2015 ICOR update.

ACLS MegaCodes Review simulator let you test your skills in real-life situations. You can practice making life-or-death decisions and learn acute ACLS interventions. Choose defibrillation levels and pharmacologic treatments for every possible resuscitation situation. Take actual practice tests used for ACLS certification.

ACLS MegaCodes Review covers everything from airway management and rhythms to electrical therapy, acute coronary syndromes, and acute stroke.

ACLS MegaCodes Review helps EMTs, nurses, students, and physicians successfully complete the American Heart Association Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) course and certification exam. Experienced providers can choose more challenging Place in Correct Order questions.
summary: ACLS MegaCodes provides a rapid review of the updated 2015 Guidelines.
recentChanges:
New AHA guidelines for 2014.
New certification MegaCodes.
AHA certification pass rate: 99.2%
*based on 2014 test results
comments: This used to be an excellent study guide, but unfortunately, it's outdated. This is pre-2015 AHA update. Lots of vasopressin questions which is no longer part of ACLS. I would love to see this app made current again.
Outdated, not even 2015 guidelines

Questions are poorly worded. Not enough information to answer some of them and when a answer is submitted, the same answer one time gives a red X and the exact same answer another time a Green check mark. I haven't found the app practice changing. Actually, from a practical aspect it is fairly useless. Lipid emulsion? Wow, that's digging deep.

Used the app for about 2weeks, now it wasn't me to but it?!?... I'm a broke a** medic student and buying something that was free then all of a sudden you have to buy it??? (LAME!!) Some good quizzes and all...

There is too much material on vasopressin, which has been removed from the ACLS algorithm. Also, I've not run across material on hypothermia post ROSC, Narcan administration, nor emergent C-section post failed resussitation on the mother. All-in-all though, I think this is a very good refresher or study tool. I just can't give better than 3 stars due to the inaccurate content. As a side note, while some of the questions are poorly worded, so are many of the actual AHA ACLS test questions.

title: Code Scribe
description:
An app designed to help run a code blue as a team leader or as a logger. Timers display time between CPR cycles and medications. Log times of medication administered and other events during a code. Use this app to help manage and document codes more effectively.

Features:
* CPR and Epinephrine Timer
* Alerts when to start next cycle
* Medication Administration
* Document Events during code
* Reminder for Reversible Causes
* Copy Code Log and Send by Email

title: ECG Interpretation : How to Read Electrocardiogram
description:
ECG interpretation, using a step-by-step process, ensures we always provide the best patient care. Since no two emergency scenes or patients are the same, it’s imperative to be methodical about the elements of the call that we can control.

ECG tracings — the diagnostic tool that analyzes the electrical function of the heart and measure voltage (vertical measurement) versus time (horizontal measurement) — can be confusing, so here are the ten steps I follow on every ECG (or EKG) to ensure I correctly identify the rhythm.

Even though there continues to be new technologies developed for the diagnostic evaluation of patients with cardiovascular disease, the electrocardiogram (ECG) retains its central role. The ECG is the most important test for interpretation of the cardiac rhythm, conduction system abnormalities, and the detection of myocardial ischemia. The ECG is also of great value in the evaluation of other types of cardiac abnormalities including valvular heart disease, cardiomyopathy, pericarditis, and hypertensive disease. Finally, the ECG can be used to monitor drug treatment (specifically antiarrhythmic therapy) and to detect metabolic disturbances.

ECG tutorial: Basic principles of ECG analysis

A systematic approach to interpretation of the ECG is imperative in order to avoid overlooking any abnormalities. Pattern recognition is helpful, but it is important to review all aspects of the ECG to not miss something. This topic review provides the framework for a systematic analysis of the ECG.


455 full size, real life ECG strips

Strips presented three ways: identified by type of problem, randomized, and embedded in case studies

Arrhythmia chapters each include practice strips to analyze rhythm, rate, interval, interpretation, etc.

Full color illustrations offer a quick review of cardiac anatomy and physiology

Clinical Tips and Hints dispersed throughout provide valuable information on rhythm interpretation and how an arrhythmia can affect a patient.

Includes a chapter on myocardial infarction and 12-lead ECG

Four 75-strip practice tests

Appendices include guidelines for CPR, ACLS, and emergency medical skills and medications

Designed to also be useful for recertification review

The purpose of this guide is to teach you to spot and accurately interpret the abnormalities that can occur on the EKG. By the end of the guide, you will be able to confidently navigate and interpret the complex road map of electrical activity and quickly evaluate all the main pointers correctly. This will put you on a steady path to being able to recognize abnormalities early and provide the best care for your patients!

EKG: EKG Interpretation Made Easy: A Complete Step-By-Step Guide to 12-Lead EKG/ECG Interpretation & Arrhythmias
Covered in the ‘Interpretation Made Easy’ guide are the following areas:
- EKG Basics
- Understanding the Intervals
- The 12-Lead EKG
- Calculating the Heart Rate
- Evaluating the Rhythm
- Sinus Arrhythmias
- Atrial Arrhythmias
- Ventricular Arrhythmias
- Determining the Axis
- Heart Block
- Sinus Block
- AV Block
- Bundle Branch Block
- Myocardial Ischemia and Infarction
- And Much More!

This is all presented with clear explanations, photos, and diagrams

title: Tricks to learn first aid 💊♿➕🤧🆕🆘
description:
🆘 From here we reveal the TIPS and tricks to help a patient who needs  first aid of the red cross 
🤕 When someone has the symptoms of a heart attack or angina we have to be prepared to know how to act.
🤒  Emergencies is something of vital importance  and we all have to know how to act in certain accidents.
🆕 If you see someone who has had an accident and needs help you can keep him alive by applying basic first aid, doing cardio pulmonary resuscitation or rcp.
🤧 We will teach you how to do the  heimlich  maneuver if someone chokes or is suffocating.
💪 With our videos we aim to relieve the pain of the patient until the health services arrive.
➕ We have videos to learn how to solve cases of:
- Poisoning
- Choking the heimlich maneuver
- Burns
- CPR Pulmonary Cardio Resuscitation
- Hemorrhages
- Sprains and fractures
- Heat stroke and heat dehydration
- Lipotimia (fainting) and coma
- What to do in earthquakes and earthquakes
- Bites

🔬 This type of  first aid is basic  so that we all know them and it would be convenient to share our app on your social networks so that we are all well prevented.
💉 It is an application that includes the  most necessary videos to apply to a wound or some sting. 
💊 Always be careful with the patient, if we have a deep cut caused by an accident we will tell you in our videos the correct way to proceed to cover the wound.
♿  We also have videos of burns or splashes of some type of acid. 
You just have to look for the corresponding first aid video to be able to apply a quick solution.
 heart attacks  are something that unfortunately ends the lives of many people, but with our application we teach you to fight it and try to avoid them.
We do simulations so that  you can share our videos on facebok so that everyone knows how to act against any unforeseen event. 
What are you waiting to download this first aid application.
All diseases can be prevented and with our app we can know how to act against any domestic accident.
If you have any chest pain or have broken a leg, it is advisable to have this app so they can give you basic emergency  aid. 
 All our videos are created by way of learning so you can apply it to daily life. 
Share your progress on facebok or your wassap contacts.
Every day we review our videos of  basic first aid  we review them so that you always have the latest rescue techniques of a person.
descriptionHTML:
🆘 From here we reveal the TIPS and tricks to help a patient who needs first aid of the red cross
🤕 When someone has the symptoms of a heart attack or angina we have to be prepared to know how to act.
🤒 Emergencies is something of vital importance and we all have to know how to act in certain accidents.
🆕 If you see someone who has had an accident and needs help you can keep him alive by applying basic first aid, doing cardio pulmonary resuscitation or rcp.
🤧 We will teach you how to do the heimlich maneuver if someone chokes or is suffocating.
💪 With our videos we aim to relieve the pain of the patient until the health services arrive.
➕ We have videos to learn how to solve cases of:
- Poisoning
- Choking the heimlich maneuver
- Burns
- CPR Pulmonary Cardio Resuscitation
- Hemorrhages
- Sprains and fractures
- Heat stroke and heat dehydration
- Lipotimia (fainting) and coma
- What to do in earthquakes and earthquakes
- Bites

🔬 This type of first aid is basic so that we all know them and it would be convenient to share our app on your social networks so that we are all well prevented.
💉 It is an application that includes the most necessary videos to apply to a wound or some sting.
💊 Always be careful with the patient, if we have a deep cut caused by an accident we will tell you in our videos the correct way to proceed to cover the wound.
♿ We also have videos of burns or splashes of some type of acid.
You just have to look for the corresponding first aid video to be able to apply a quick solution.
heart attacks are something that unfortunately ends the lives of many people, but with our application we teach you to fight it and try to avoid them.
We do simulations so that you can share our videos on facebok so that everyone knows how to act against any unforeseen event.
What are you waiting to download this first aid application.
All diseases can be prevented and with our app we can know how to act against any domestic accident.
If you have any chest pain or have broken a leg, it is advisable to have this app so they can give you basic emergency aid.
All our videos are created by way of learning so you can apply it to daily life.
Share your progress on facebok or your wassap contacts.
Every day we review our videos of basic first aid we review them so that you always have the latest rescue techniques of a person.
summary: 🤕🤒💪🔬💉 The secrets to be able to treat a sick person with first aid

description: Responder app for CPR Save network. After successful registration, users of this app will be contacted via voice and text if they are near to a CPR emergency activated on the CPR Save network.

title: simulador RCP.
description:
Simulador en forma de joc, dirigit, en principi, a personal sanitari. Es realment la versió APP-android d'una aplicació web creada el 1998 Simulador RCP és el joc que es va incloure en un "Sistema d'utilitats per a la consulta 'atenció primària" (treball que va obtenir el primer premi del I congrés de tecnologies de la informació per a la salut, de Tarragona, 24  i 25 de maig 2001).

La pretensió d'aquest joc, a base de jugar una vegada i altre es adquirir habilitats mentals durant la RCP (aprendre a dirigir,  pendre decisions, i actuar de forma ordenada durant la realització d'una RCP).
Cada vegada que es juga es diferent.

A disfrutar jugant

title: HSI Passport
description:
ASHI & MEDIC First Aid students can unleash the power of their certification card by registering their card in Passport, providing immediate access to step-by-step skills guides from training classes.

Also included in Passport is access to a digital version of their class Student Guide, essential reference and class topic videos, and a CPR metronome.

Passport can also remind you when your certification is about to expire so you can sign up for your recertification class.
descriptionHTML:
ASHI & MEDIC First Aid students can unleash the power of their certification card by registering their card in Passport, providing immediate access to step-by-step skills guides from training classes.

Also included in Passport is access to a digital version of their class Student Guide, essential reference and class topic videos, and a CPR metronome.

Passport can also remind you when your certification is about to expire so you can sign up for your recertification class.
summary: Skill guides, videos, and tools for ASHI & MEDIC First Aid students.
comments: I'm another one that couldn't register my card. It's been a year since I got it, and have not been able to get past the Card Registration screen; I get a "communication with server failed" error. I appreciate the training I received from HSI, but the app is useless. I really wish I could access the additional info promised on my certificate.

I Got the course through Medic First Aid since 07/ 2020 till now I cannot access the Mobile App as it states failed to communicate with server this is really unprofessional and I see when I read some of the reviews that other Reviewers complained about the same problem year ago and still no respond from the provider ( this is a worthless App) and a waste of time .

At first the app would not let me register ( I think the facility has to update their end first and it is not a high priority). I checked back a year later and could view video that was more effective (automated/visual illustrations are informative). Meanwhile I downloaded "first aid" from play store... It was informative as well. I wouldn't think it took a year.. I just didnt bother.. It is frustrating when a business takes your money then individuals working there drag their feet and don't deliver as promissed. (Up to when the collected my money they were more than helpful. KeysToSafety LLC in Twin). I hope this review will help people by knowing they may benefit by giving the certifiers time to prepare for you registration.

This application is for students who register with an ASHI instructor. It 
works perfectly for my students! They shedule an appointment for skills 
test with me from the app. I provided them a code related to my TC.
Great app to fall back on after you just trained helps to remember it till it's permanently in your head

title: Crowdsav
description: Crowdsav is a crowdsourcing platform which complements your CPR training session, and at the same time provides a way for others who have not been trained to experience the action of Hands-only CPR. Our app learns the movements of your hands during Hands-only CPR training, and replicates it later on at your convenience. The app also allows you to refresh your own CPR training using everyday items at home or at work instead of the manikin, eg pillow, sofa, mattress etc.

summary: Crowdsav: Your CPR & AED app!
recentChanges:
1. Group messaging allows for better coordination between first responders. A group needs minimum 4 verified smartphone numbers to start messaging each other.
2. New chest compression algorithms undergoing followup clinical trial.
3. AED locations can be searched for 24 hour accessibility.
4. Volunteers who uploaded AED location data will be notified about their efforts via email if registered.
comments: Having a log in page when you want to know where the nearest defib is located isn't good, it means there is a stage before telling you where it is. I suggest not a good idea in a stressed situation when you need a defib and you need its location now
The AED locator is good, but I'm not so sure about the reliability of the Google maps for finding them. The CPR compressions on the non-dummy practice sessions appear to be very very slow!
Not loading and constantly crashing, reports won't send then app blacks out
Would be useful if the app showed a map with all the available AEDs rather than a long list of locations, some of which have a poor description.
Does not work Note 9 Please test prior to getting into an emergency situation.

title: Critical Care ACLS Guide
description:
*** A recent issue caused the content download process to fail and prevented some users from accessing the app. This issue has now been fixed. Please re-install and try the download again. ***

The Informed® Critical Care ACLS Guide™ for Android gives you immediate access to critical information in an easy-to-use app with rich content, detailed illustrations, and pioneering features.

* Quick navigation to critical information 
* Custom bookmarks let you quickly return to your favorite pages 
* Expanded search capability 
* Add notes to a page 
* Calculators 

“I have been using Informed’s Critical Care ACLS Guide for years and never go to work without it.” 
—Shaun Michael Scott, RN, EMTP, CareFlite Flight Nurse 

Best of all, you know you can depend on the Critical Care ACLS Guide™ for Android, because it was created by Informed Publishing—the trusted leader in emergency reference information since 1986. Informed’s print and digital guides are carried in the pockets, on mobile devices, and in the emergency vehicles of over one million first responders nationwide. 

The Critical Care ACLS Guide™ for Android makes it easy for physicians, paramedics and nurses check ACLS drug doses, interpret EKGs, look up patient medications, and much more. 

Critical information covers use of airway devices such as the Combitube, LMA, and King LT™ Airway, a complete list of emergency & ACLS drugs, including Natrecor and Ketamine, an extensive prescription drug list, Rapid 12-Lead EKG interpretation page, dermatomes, hemodynamics, lab values, and a complete list of abbreviations. 
* Current ACLS Algorithms 
* Emergency & ACLS Drugs 
* 12-Lead EKG Section & Acute MI 
* Basic EKG Rhythms 
* Laryngeal Mask Airway / RSI 
* “Rave” Drugs 
* Basic Chest X-Ray Interpretation 
* Fibrinolytic Screen for AMI & Stroke 
* Ischemic Stroke Management / Neuro 
* Pediatric Resuscitation, Drug Doses, Vitals 
* End-Tidal CO2 / Capnography / Ventilator Guidelines 
* Trauma & Glasgow Coma Scales 
* Common Medical Emergencies 
* Burn Charts, the “Rule of 9s” 
* Pulse Oximetry, IV Drip Rates 
* Quick EMS Spanish Translations 
* Lab Values, Metrics, and Notes Pages

NOTE:  For issues related to problems downloading the app or with refunds please call 1-888-624-8014 or email apps@informedguides.com.  Please contact us before leaving negative reviews.

comments: After expierencing several issues and contacting tech support this is the response i received. Hi, I contacted the Product team and was told this app has not been updated for 5 years. It's very old. He also stated that there were no plans to update the existing version. He is going to check to see if there are plans to replace it. In the meantime you may want to get a refund. So then why have an outdated app available when you have zero intent of supporting or updating it? SMH.
Need to update app. Standards are behind the printed field guide version. I would think it would be easier to update an app then to print new field guides.
Everytime I open this app it tells me I need to update it and when I try to do so there is no update. What gives.
When can we expect an update to this app???
The go to app in my tool box

title: ReSimulate
description:
ReSimulate is a rescue simulator for cardiological training scenarios.

- Train with simulated patient monitoring.
- Simulation control via Wifi/Bluetooth
- Smooth scenario transitions.

ReSimulate offers the possibility to easily connect two Android devices via Wifi/Bluetooth and start the training.

- Simple setup via the Google Play Store.
- One-to-one connections for training.
- Intuitive user interface.
- Many cardiology scenarios available.
- Solo mode for self-sufficient training.

ReSimulate is free and contains no ads. 
Since 14.10.2019 the source code of the app is available on GitHub. You can find the link on the website: resimulate.de/en

comments: Just had a quick look at it and looks and sounds realistic. Love the way it is setup and how it just uses wifi/bluetooth to connect the devices with user friendly interface. Great design especially the ability to create or design scenarios and share them. Best of all it is ad free and FREE! The designer/owner is very generous. This app will definitely make a difference especially in the developing and under developed world with regards to training first responders and resus teams. Thank you.☺
The app is good, but the beep frequency is always changing and I hope that there's a way to turn off the defibrillator panel and settings to change the beep and overall appearance.
Absolutely fantastic as a student Paramedic practicing ALS/PALS, anywhere, anytime!
Best app for the job, I love it. The creator is a super nice guy :)

title: TruMonitor - TruVent - Simulated Patient Monitor
description:
Excellent learning tool for doctors, medical students, nurses and paramedics/EMS.

Undertake realistic medical simulation training without the need for expensive/high-fidelity mannequins. 

Perfect revision aid for life support courses, OSCE exam preparation or ad hoc teaching.

Verbally create a scenario as simple or as complex as the teacher wishes. If the student has a 2nd device, connect via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi and the 2nd device becomes a realistic monitor.

If the student initiates appropriate management for the simulated patient, the teacher can improve the patient’s vital signs. If not... the patient can deteriorate and eventually suffer cardiac arrest.

The teacher can alter multiple patient parameters as the scenario evolves:

- ECG
- BP
- Arterial Line
- SpO2
- Resp Rate
- Temperature
- Fingerprick Glucose
- Capnography (once intubated)
- End-Tidal CO2
- Lab results - Haematology/Biochemistry/Blood gases

Change ECG rhythms instantly or via defibrillation/CPR cycle.

Choose from an extensive list of ECG rhythms (upgrade required to access advanced waveforms)
•Normal Sinus Rhythm
•VF
•VT
•Asystole
•Various AV conduction defects
•AF
•AF with digoxin effect
•Torsades de Pointes
•Atrial Flutter
•Flutter Pause
•Bigeminy
•Electrical Alternans
•Mild / Severe hyperkalaemia
•Junctional Escape
•Long QT
•Multiple Ectopics
•Pacemaker with and without capture
•Pre-Excited AF
•ST elevation / depression
•SVT
•Wolf Parkinson White

Once intubated, multiple capnography options are available (upgrade required to access advanced waveforms)
•Normal Breathing
•Rebreathing
•Obstructive Breathing
•Apnoea
•Breathing System Disconnection
•Malignant Hyperpyrexia
•Inadequate Paralysis
•Acute Loss of Cardiac Output


Attributions: https://bit.ly/3cSXaqs

comments: Really good app, a lot of customisation that you can do to lungs and vital signs. Even though the monitor and ventilator are generic / made up they act surprisingly realistic. It needs a deliberate press to set changes into the machine. Really good learning tool thanks.

tried everything to get two devices to interact. two android, two ios, different wifi networks, bluetooth on/off etc. no chance. if it doesnt work out of the box in the trial period i won't bother emailing support - doesn't bode well for the product. especially considering the cost.
Good app, but it is too expensive ($ 1450 USD) after the 21 trial days. It should have better support for small devices and include an option to type the information instead of sliders.
I found it is not compatible with Android 10. Client can't be detected when I use my andoird 10 phone as instructor.
Very good for developing training alongside my students, and the support is good too.

title: CPR checker
description:
This application is an application that measures the rhythm of chest compressions in real time.

There are two mode

1) rhythm check mode
    Please tap the screen according to the chest compressions.
it is BPM for 1 minute is displayed.

2) rhythm training mode
    please Start chest compressions in time with the tempo

Please use it for training of resuscitation.

recentChanges: UI bug fixes
comments: Thank you for this very helpful app. However, I would like to request a setting to see the notifications in original Korean. The English translations are actually very bad and hard to understand. There are many foreigners (like me) that can use a little Korean. With the option to see the original Korean, we can translate the parts we don't understand by ourselves. Currently, I believe most foreigners will not be able to understand the poor English translations and this could be dangerous.

EDIT: Thank you for responding! Please make it more obvious for what areas I'm getting notifications (like a map), and use regular notifications rather than your custom full-screen ones. ORIGINAL: Ridiculous. I get a full-screen notification of some "emergency" every 30min. It turns my phone on in bed and in my pocket and keeps the screen on. And the alerts are machine-translated so half the time they don't make any sense. I'm reviewing this while the COVID-19 Coronavirus outbreak is happening, but this is complete overkill. The notification "XYZ location is getting regularly disinfected" should go away, or be a regular notification, not full screen blocking everything.
Way too disruptive. Translations are not accurate. Annoying to have 15 alerts every 10 minutes.

Great to get translation of messages, but the location service doesn't work. So, I'm getting notifications from the whole country and it's running down the battery on my phone waking it up every other minute.
Good, but there are too many notices. It is interfering with my being able to use my phone.

title: RCP para padres
description:
La aplicación RCP para Padres nos ofrece de una manera sencilla información instantánea sobre la realización de maniobras de Reanimación CardioPulmonar (RCP) en neonatos y lactantes y en los casos en los que se produzca una Obstrucción de la Vía Aérea por un Cuerpo extraño (OVACE).

El contenido de esta aplicación consta de:

-Vídeos  formativos con la secuencia completa a realizar en casos de parada cardiorrespiratoria y/o obstrucción de la vía aérea por un cuerpo extraño.
- Vídeos formativos de cada maniobra de manera individualizada.
- Imágenes y textos ilustrativos donde se describe cada paso a realizar.
- Posibilidad de descarga de los vídeos en sus terminales o visualización online de los mismos.
- Botón de llamada de emergencia al servicio 112.
- Vídeos subtitulados en castellano para personas con discapacidad auditiva.

Esta aplicación sigue las recomendaciones del Grupo Español de Reanimación Cardiopulmonar Pediátrica y Neonatal (GERCPPYN). Ha sido realizada por un grupo de sanitarios pertenecientes a la Unidad de Neonatología y Medicina Intensiva Pediátrica del Hospital Universitario Nuestra Señora de Candelaria (HUNSC) en Santa Cruz de Tenerife, donde, desde el año 2011, ofrecemos a los padres de nuestros pacientes formación en RCP Básica Pediátrica y Neonatal. Ahora queremos hacérsela llegar a todos ustedes a través de esta aplicación, para que cualquiera que lo desee pueda disponer de ella.

Esta aplicación es totalmente gratuita.

La información contenida en esta aplicación no sustituye en forma alguna a una adecuada formación en Reanimación Cardiopulmonar pero resulta muy útil para tener un rápido panorama. Desde aquí queremos animarles a realizar formación reglada sobre Reanimación Cardiopulmonar ya que gracias a ello se pueden salvar muchas vidas.

Ha sido realizada por un grupo de sanitarios pertenecientes a la Unidad de Neonatología y Medicina Intensiva Pediátrica del Hospital Universitario Nuestra Señora de Candelaria (HUNSC) en Santa Cruz de Tenerife, donde, desde el año 2011, ofrecemos a los padres de nuestros pacientes formación en RCP Básica Pediátrica y Neonatal. Ahora queremos hacérsela llegar a todos ustedes a través de esta aplicación, para que cualquiera que lo desee pueda disponer de ella.

Esta aplicación es totalmente gratuita.

La información contenida en esta aplicación no sustituye en forma alguna a una adecuada formación en Reanimación Cardiopulmonar pero resulta muy útil para tener un rápido panorama. Desde aquí queremos animarles a realizar formación reglada sobre Reanimación Cardiopulmonar ya que gracias a ello se pueden salvar muchas vidas.
summary: instant feedback on CPR in neonates and infants
recentChanges: Política de privacidad
comments: Muy bien explicado, falta explicación para los niños más grandes .

title: Indian Red Cross First Aid
description:
This Indian Red Cross Society First Aid application provides you first aid guidelines to handle day-to-day emergencies. 
The information included is updated using the latest international guidelines for first aid (2015-2016). All instructions are adapted to the local Indian context by a team of Indian medical and first aid experts.The content is based on the evidence based first guidelines included in the reference manual Indian First Aid Guidelines (IFAG) and the Indian First Aid Manual  (IFAM) (2016). The application and the content will be frequently updated and its functionality expanded.
The Indian Red Cross Society and St John Ambulance of India provide practical certified first aid courses all over India. Contact your local branch for more information.
Download this free first aid application. 

Features:
•	Simple step-by-step instructions and illustrationsicon touch-driven guide you through everyday first aid and health scenarios.
•	Icons to select can be set to ‘large’ mode for easier selection on smaller handhelds or to improve readability.
-	Step by step instructions illustrate basic first aid techniques as CPR, recovery position and other.
-	Instructions can be retrieved by simple search on keywords.
-	One click action to call an emergency number 112 or to call a personal contact. A personal emergency contact list can be created.
-	Via one click alocal map can be uploaded to locate the nearby hospitals and the routes to reach them (using GPS and Google Map functionality).
The app is ad-free and spam free.
System requirements:
•	Works online and offline. To install or to update the content an internet connection (phone or wifi) is required.
•	The Google Map functionality to be installed on the handset. Requires GPS and internet connection.
Android 3.2 or upwards.
Version:
•	1.0 Beta
Copyright © 2016TheIndian Red Cross Society.

title: ACLS Rhythm Tutor
description:
Anesoft Corporation suggests you use our latest app, ECG Rhythm and Pulse which combines the content of Rhythm Tutor, Rhythm Quiz and ACLS Simulator into one app. And its free! It also includes Spanish and Chinese language options and is optimized for Android phones and tablets.

'Anesoft ACLS Rhythm Tutor' is one of the series of apps from Anesoft Corporation to improve your ACLS resuscitation skills. This app will teach and reinforce an organized approach to identification of electrocardiogram rhythms. 

The current version has improved graphics and performance.

Recognition of ECG rhythms as the wave forms sweep across a monitor screen is a different skill than diagnosing cardiac rhythms on a static tracing. This app will improve your clinical skills more than reviewing with a book because you will learn to diagnose the rhythms as they dynamically move across the screen.

The app utilizes an organized four criteria approach to identify the rhythms. Then study the description of the rhythm to understand the electrophysiology. Use the same process to review all the ECG rhythms.

There are 80 ECG rhythms included in this app.

When you feel you have mastered the rhythms in this program you should test yourself using the app 'Anesoft ACLS Rhythm Quiz'.

title: Get Ready Emergency
description:
Welcome to the Get Ready Emergency App
This app was developed by healthcare professionals to provide the public with immediate access to over 70 short “How To” videos. The Get Ready Emergency App is always with you!
Emergency Categories
Our easy-to-use app is divided into six medical emergency types:
» ABC’s (choking, anaphylaxis, drowning, CPR/AED)
» Trauma (broken bones, burns, head, neck and back injuries)
» Medical (asthma, heart and stroke, seizures)
» Environmental (bites, stings, heat stroke, frostbite, hypothermia)
» Overdose (drug and alcohol overdose, including opiates OD and Narcan administration)
» Mass Casualty (triage and treatment guideline)
Safety Tools
These safety features provide instant access to further assistance without leaving the app
» Call 911 – right from the App
» Maps – to learn your location and address
» Take a pic/video – save it to your Gallery
» Flashlight
» Strobe
» Personal Safety Alarm
» INFO – takes you to official links for more information before, during or after an incident.
Emergency Procedures
This feature provides quick information on what to do during emergency and disaster situations listed below:
» Person with a Weapon (Active Shooter)
» Suspicious Package
» Exploded Bomb
» Vehicle Attack
» Opioid Overdose
» Fire Evacuation
» Tornado
» Earthquake
» Tsunami
Ease of Use
Each section is no more than 3 clicks away from the needed information. Text or Voice activates searches to immediately navigate to treatment topics.
All the content including the videos are installed in the initial installation, so that the content and videos are accessible when Data or Wi-Fi are not available. The app is less than 100mb in size.
Intended Audience
Everyone should have this app, but especially:
» First Aid / CPR course participants
» High school and post-secondary students
» Industry first aid responders
» Fire Wardens
» School medical response teams
» Teachers
» Early childhood workers
» Babysitters
» Security guards
» Sports coaches and trainers
» Parents
» Seniors
» Travelers, campers and boaters
» and people who care about health and well-being
Disclaimer
While treatment protocols may vary from place to place, we have used the standards established by Health Canada, Ontario Ministry of Health, Emergency Health Services Branch - Pre-hospital Care guidelines, Ontario Ministry of Labour, International Liaison Consortium On Resuscitation (ILCOR), Heart & Stroke Foundation (HSF), American Heart Association (AHA), NFPA, and OSHA.
This app supports the first aider in a medical or emergency situation and is not intended as a substitute for First Aid and CPR training. Get Ready Inc. encourages everyone to participate in First Aid and CPR training. In the event a person or App customer is unsure of what to do or needs help, call 9-1-1 or Emergency Medical Services as soon as possible.

title: AnestCRITIC Crisis y Anestesia
description:
Anestcritic es la primera app de ayudas cognitivas para el manejo de crisis en anestesiología y cuidados críticos. Esta app forma parte de un proyecto colaborativo y multidisciplinar enfocado a la mejora de la seguridad en situaciones críticas, y ha sido elaborada por más de 90 profesionales de múltiples especialidades basándose en la más reciente evidencia científica y en su experiencia frente a estos eventos.

Características:
- Ayudas clasificadas según temática
- Buscador por palabras
- Explicación de bases teóricas de cada situación
- Calculadora de dosis
- Protocolos enlazados a un solo toque mediante palabras claves
- Botón de llamada de emergencia configurable
- Constante actualización y mejora

Contenido:
- Prevención:
Antes de empezar la cirugía
Comunicación y traslado
Debriefing
Manejo de anticoagulantes orales
Recursos para el manejo de crisis
Utilización de fármacos

title: Airway Ex: Sharpen Your Intubation Skills
description:
Perform challenging airway procedures, sharpen your intubation skills, and earn CME with Airway Ex, the first professional video game for practicing Anesthesiologists, CRNAs, and medical professionals who perform airway procedures.

In Airway Ex, you can:
- Explore realistic airway procedures recreated from real cases submitted by doctors 
- Train on the latest endoscopic devices with realistic range of motion, lens optics, and scope behaviors 
- Earn Continuing Medical Education (CME) credits when you play through cases 
- Get scored on skill, speed, damage, bleeding, navigation, recall, and more
- Treat patients that are responsive with changes in tissue behavior, breathing, bleeding, and fluids/secretions
- Monitor responsive Sp02 and HR vital signs based on stability or distress caused to virtual patient 

MORE ABOUT AIRWAY EX:
Our app provides unprecedented medical realism, enabled by the accurate simulation of human tissue dynamics, realistic scope optics, and moving fluids to recreate life-like airway procedures. We also provide a new modality for continuing medical education (CME), offering AMA PRA Category 1 Credits(TM) for completing airway procedures in-app.

Virtual patient cases are modeled from actual surgical procedures submitted by doctors. Each case is vetted by medical experts with clinical simulation training experience from top hospitals. Airway Ex lets you train using ultra-realistic patient scenarios with high-quality, immersive simulations. 

Find out more at www.levelex.com/games/airway-ex.

summary: Secure & manage airways in difficult anesthesia cases
recentChanges:
Introducing new total intravenous anesthesia (TIVA) levels! TIVA levels turn up the challenge with many patients under your care—some with BIS™ monitoring technology and some without. Keep all of your patients at the optimal anesthesia level to claim victory!

Thanks for playing! Share your feedback at support@level-ex.com, and don't forget to review us. For more information, visit www.levelex.com.
comments: Login complete but not proceeding beyond that point .Reinstalled many times but still having same problem..

Overall, I am very impressed by this app. Visually, this looks exactly like the actual procedure simulators I have played in the past. The scope controls are accurate and appropriately difficult to maneuver. I thoroughly enjoyed the COVID-19 cases they set up as well. The "Achievements" need adjustment though. "No Going Back" is too sensitive, and will often not award even though I have not backtracked. "Scope Sprinter" is virtually impossible for some cases, and would be very unsafe in reality
Log in complete but not proceeding beyond that point. Reinstalled and having same problem.
Exceptional fun and great for learning

This is one of the best tools to help someone learn if they are new to this type of stuff. Also a little suggestion, could you make it to where you can optimize the games graphics for certain phones bc right now my phone can only run without lagging while going through the airways, and when it lags it kinda makes me run into the tissue giving me a lower score. Anyways, great tool and fun to use.

title: Learn First Aid
description:
With this application learning first aid will be easy with these videos step by step. First aid is the basic and necessary help that is given to a person who has suffered some kind of accident or illness until the arrival of a doctor or a professional that you know what to do in that situation.
The main cases that require first aid are asphyxiation, fractures, burns, hemorrhages ...
With this application you will find all the videos step by step so you know what to do and learn with this free application and what you can share will be easy because you will know what to do when something happens.
This application is free and can be shared with your friends in which tutorial videos will come where learning first aid will be free and easy with this app that you can share with your friends and family.
You also have to know 7 basic first aid steps:
1. Control yourself
2. Personal security
3. Evaluate the injured.
4. Vital signs.
5. In case of suffocation.
6. Respiration of salvation.
7. Pulmonary cardio breathing (CPR).
With these simple steps you can save someone's life. However, do not forget that the most important thing is to call medical services immediately to avoid any kind of complication.
So with this application you will have all the steps to know how to act before any situation, without having any problem.

title: First Aid
description:
First aid is a medical treatment, giving an emergency help to a person who is sick or critically injured.
First aid is like the basic need of your health and medical condition. This First aid app having multiple topics of health and medical condition in which you required first aid immediately. Like Heart problems, CPR, Stroke, drowning etc. 
This app also having first aid kits that are mandatory while you are traveling. First aid kits helps you to perform first aid if you have any medical problem or in any critical medical conditions. First aid kits contains the entire medication inventory that you may require in critical condition while you having no rescue or hospital nearby. 
The main aim of app is to ensure to keep the person safe until he/she reached by the rescue. The app also having emergency numbers all over the world. It helps you out when you are in foreign country to reach emergency quickly. Our app also provide emergency call widget that can be very useful when you are in real hurry. 
First aid is like the basic need of your life so we have added the prescriptions that you require in medical condition.

title: AGN Emergency Booklet
description:
The emergency booklet "Drugs and Benchmarks in Emergency Medicine" (original German title "Medikamente und Richtwerte in der Notfallmedizin"), which has been sold 58,000 times in the German speaking area, is now available as an internet-independent , interactive Emergency App.

Hundreds of medications, dosages, scores, algorithms, ventilation parameters of emergency medicine, intensive care, and anesthesia can now be calculated within seconds. A children's calculator indicates all cardiopulmonary parameters and dosages for a child. All scores and tables (GCS, APGAR, ASA, NACA, NYHA, Baxter, VIP, BMI, etc.) are interactively operated by simply tapping on the screen.

Bolus as well as continuous applications can be calculated with lightning speed - for newborn children up to adults with morbid obesity. The app not only provides the simple resuscitation dose of epinephrine, but also the setting of the syringe pump (perfusor) for a toddler in cardiogenic shock - or do you prefer vasopressin?

The App not only provides tailored information for emergency physicians and paramedics in the ambulance service, but in also for all practical and clinically active physicians, especially for doctors and qualified nurses of anesthesia, intensive care and emergency medicine. Medical algorithms, such as algorithms for ACS (acute coronary syndrome) according to ESC, Advanced Life Support, CPR guidelines and neonatal CPR according to the ERC can be operated interactively. Parameters to respiration or intubation are quickly and easily available and predictable.

Other useful features such as a note and favorites function as well as directly selectable emergency phone numbers round off the comprehensive app. A search function helps you to find all the required information quickly; a glossary precisely explains each concept and each abbreviation.

The AGN Emergency Booklet is recommended by ÖRK (Austrian Red Cross), ÖNK (Austrian Society for Emergency and Disaster Medicine), ARC (Austrian Resuscitation Council), ÖBRD (Austrian Mountain Rescue), ICAR-CISA (International Commission for Alpine rescue) and the MC (Medical Corps Graz) .

Note: This version (Standard Version) will still be updated with critical fixes while the Pro Version (see http://goo.gl/mRYbb6) will be extended with new content in the future.

Currently, the app is available in German only.

title: Mikey Young at Heart AED & CPR
description: The Mikey Young at Heart app is a great way to earn the volunteer hours you need to graduate from high school while learning life-saving AED & CPR skills. It’s easy! All you need to do is download the app, sign up, and watch some educational videos about CPR and How To Use an AED. Complete the quiz after each video and by the end you’ll have learned how to deal with an emergency medical situation. You may even be able to save a life one day! The app works on any mobile device so you can earn your volunteer hours from the comfort of your home or even at school or the library. Plus it’s a great tool for keeping track of ALL your volunteer hours.

title: Rescuebusters : Fire & First-Aid
description:
First Aid and Fire Safety learning made fun! Do you recognise all the fire hazards and are your CPR skills up to date? Join Max Shelter and the busters to find out!

Follow your avatar in the story with their personal companion buster model G-182. The busters are talking robots which are not the brightest bunch but perhaps there is a way to change that... The story advances the more you play!

You will learn about important fire and first aid safety in school levels and then head to city missions to rescue people! The school classes for First aid go through all important situations for commoners from small wounds and the Heimlich maneuver to CPR and even brain seizure.
In the Fire school you play classes such as Fire Prevention where you must deal with dangerous household items as quickly as possible. You get to try out and recognize the proper extinguishers for initial extinguishing and play levels of exiting during fire.

Rescuebusters safety learning game is made by Finnish safety experts.
The game doesn't replace learning safety guided by a health care professional.

Please note : The first aid and fire safety is based solely upon Finnish protocols. Beware of safety and emergency protocols of your own country.

title: EMT Exam Prep 2020
description:
The National Registry Emergency Medical Technician (NREMT) cognitive exam is a computer adaptive test (CAT). The number of items a candidate can expect on the EMT-B exam will range from 70 to 120. Each exam will have between 60 to 110 ‘live’ items that count toward the final score. The exam will also have 10 pilot questions that do not affect the final score. The maximum amount of time given to complete the exam is 2 hours.

The exam will cover the entire spectrum of EMS care including: Airway, Respiration & Ventilation; Cardiology & Resuscitation; Trauma; Medical; Obstetrics/Gynecology; EMS Operations. Items related to patient care are focused on adult and geriatric patients (85%) and pediatric patients (15%). In order to pass the exam, candidates must meet a standard level of competency. The passing standard is defined by the ability to provide safe and effective entry level emergency medical care.

This app also contains over 1,600 practice questions you will be asked in the actual exam.

- 1,600+ Real Exam Questions
- 42 Practice Tests, including section-specific practice tests
- 8 Full-Length Exams
- Get immediate feedback for correct or incorrect answers
- Full and Detailed Explanations - learn as you practice
- Dark Mode - allows you to study anywhere, anytime
- Progress Metrics - you can keep track of your results and score trends
- Track Past Test Results - Individual tests will be listed with pass or fail and your mark
- Review Errors - Review all your mistakes so you don't repeat them in the real test
- You can track how many questions you have done correctly, incorrectly, and get a final passing or failing score based on official passing grades
- Take a practice test and see if you can score well enough to pass the actual test
- Helpful hints and tips let you know how you can improve your score
- Send questions feedback directly from the app

Note: If a candidate is not successful in passing the cognitive exam, the National Registry will provide a candidate feedback on their performance. Candidates may apply to retest 15 days after the last examination.

If you have covered all the material in this app - It should be a breeze!
